```{r}
npages <- 10  
dates <- c()
titles <- c()
links <- c()
url_template <-"https://rabota.ua/%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BA%D0%B0%D0%BD%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%B8/%D0%B0%D1%80%D1%85%D0%B8%D0%B2/%D0%B2_%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%BD%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B5/%D1%83%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B0/pg"
```


```{r}
for (page in 1:npages) {
  url <- str_c(url_template,
               page)
  
  content <- read_html(url)
  
  titles <- content %>%
    html_nodes('a.t') %>%
    html_text() %>%
    str_trim() %>%
    c(titles, .)   
  dates <- content %>%
    html_nodes('div.dt') %>%
    html_text() %>%
    str_trim()  %>%
    c(dates, .)
  
  links <- content %>%
    html_nodes('a.t') %>%
    html_attr("href") %>%
    c(links, .)
  
  Sys.sleep(3)   
}
```

```{r}
data.frame(title = titles,
           date = dates,
           link = links) %>%
  write.csv("rabota.csv",
            row.names = FALSE) 
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("rabota.csv")
df
```
